userStories.title: FDF Captions Not Persisting Locally
userStories.description: As a user, I want FDF captions to persist in local storage before syncing so that when I navigate out and back into a room, my captions are still visible.
acceptanceCriteria: FDF captions persist locally after entry
Captions remain visible when navigating out and back into a room
Captions do not require sync to be visible locally

userStories.title: FDF Annotations on Images Not Persisting Locally
userStories.description: As a user, I want FDF annotations on images to persist in local storage before syncing so that my annotations are preserved when navigating between rooms.
acceptanceCriteria: Image annotations persist locally after creation
Annotations remain visible when navigating out and back into a room
Annotations do not require sync to be visible locally

userStories.title: Background Sync Pausing When App Not Active
userStories.description: As a user, I want syncing to continue as long as the app is not killed, even when the app is in the background or when I navigate to a different project/template.
acceptanceCriteria: Syncing continues when app is in background (not killed)
Syncing continues when navigating to a different project
Sync only stops when app is fully terminated
